### Random Patient Generator

<div>
  <button onclick="generatePatient()">Generate Random Patient</button>
  <ul>
    <li><strong>Age:</strong> <u><span id="random-age"></span></u></li>
    <li><strong>Sex:</strong> <u><span id="random-sex"></span></u></li>
    <li><strong>Height (cm):</strong> <u><span id="random-height"></span></u></li>
    <li><strong>Weight (kg):</strong> <u><span id="random-weight"></span></u></li>
    <li><strong>Creatinine (mg/dL):</strong> <u><span id="random-creatinine"></span></u></li>
  </ul>
</div>

<script>
  function generatePatient() {
    // Generate random values
    var age = Math.floor(Math.random() * (90 - 18 + 1)) + 18;
    var sex = Math.random() < 0.5 ? "Male" : "Female";
    var height = Math.floor(Math.random() * (200 - 140 + 1)) + 140;
    var weight = Math.floor(Math.random() * (140 - 40 + 1)) + 40;
    var creatinine = (Math.random() * (2.0 - 0.5) + 0.5).toFixed(2);

    // Update the UI
    document.getElementById('random-age').innerText = age;
    document.getElementById('random-sex').innerText = sex;
    document.getElementById('random-height').innerText = height;
    document.getElementById('random-weight').innerText = weight;
    document.getElementById('random-creatinine').innerText = creatinine;

    // Store in localStorage
    var patient = {
      age: age,
      sex: sex,
      height: height,
      weight: weight,
      creatinine: creatinine
    };
    localStorage.setItem('randomPatient', JSON.stringify(patient));
  }

  // On page load, check if there's a saved patient and display it
  window.onload = function() {
    var savedPatient = localStorage.getItem('randomPatient');
    if (savedPatient) {
      var patient = JSON.parse(savedPatient);
      document.getElementById('random-age').innerText = patient.age;
      document.getElementById('random-sex').innerText = patient.sex;
      document.getElementById('random-height').innerText = patient.height;
      document.getElementById('random-weight').innerText = patient.weight;
      document.getElementById('random-creatinine').innerText = patient.creatinine;
    }
  }
</script>
:::
